name: pgn-monorepo
description: Monorepo containing React Native mobile app and Next.js web application

scripts.clean: npm run clean:mobile && npm run clean:web && npm run clean:shared
scripts.clean:mobile: cd apps/mobile && npm run clean || rm -rf node_modules
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:mobile && npm run build:web
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:shared" "npm run dev:mobile" "npm run dev:web"
scripts.test: npm run test:mobile && npm run test:web && npm run test:shared
scripts.lint: npm run lint:mobile && npm run lint:web && npm run lint:shared
